title: Fruity fromage frais cake
description: This yoghurt cake is made with fromage frais - the yoghurt pot is used to measure out the other ingredients!
ingredients: 1 x 45g/1¾oz pot fruit-flavoured fromage frais (pot washed and reserved for measuring the sugar and flour, see below)
1 fresh peach or nectarine, stone removed, chopped
2 tbsp vegetable oil plus some extra for brushing loaf tin
